My friend's daughter is getting a new mattress and asked her mom if she could get a ThermaCare Sleep System, then when my friend said, 'Uh, NO!' she asked if they could go to Capital mattress and Waterbed store.

Out of the mouth of my baby brother (who is still going to die!!!):

I told him that I was bi (haven't talked to him since I came out) and after we talked for a bit he said, 'Yeah, I can see that.  Alan [my ex-husband] was woman enough.'

I almost fuckin died!

So, yeah, he's living in Ft Ann with his ex gf, and is still moving but now he's going to florida with his best friend instead of Carolina with some random friend that I don't know.  I can live with Florida, cos I know, trust, and like his best friend.

But I'm still gonna fuckin kill him!!!

I am the guy who came out to the entire school in his senior speech and got a standing ovation for his courage.

I am the girl who kisses her girlfriend on the sidewalk and laughs at those who glare.

We are the couple who planned and studied and got a damn good lawyer and BEAT the state that wanted to take our child away.

We are the ones who took martial arts classes and carry pepper spray and are just too dangerous to gay bash.

I am the transgender person who uses the bathroom that suits me, and demands that any complaining staff explain their complaint to my face in front of the entire restaurant -- and shares with my other trans friends which restaurants don't raise a stink.

I am the mother who told her lesbian daughter to invite her girlfriend over for dinner.

I am the father who punished his son for calling you a fag.

I am the preacher who told my congregation that love, not hate, is the definition of a true follower 
of God.

I am the girl who did not learn the meaning of "homosexual" until high school but never thought to question why two men might be kissing.

I am the woman who argues (quite loudly and vehemently) with the bigots who insist that you do not have the right to marry or raise children.

We are the high school class who agrees, unanimously, along with our teacher, that love should be all that matters.



If you agree, repost this. Do it. You don't have to be afraid. You can handle it. You're stronger than you 
think.

I am making a difference. Hate will not win.

Read BEFORE forming the lynch mobs!!! 1) Being gay is not natural. Real Americans always reject unnatural things like eyeglasses, polyester, and air conditioning. 2) Gay marriage will encourage people to be gay, in the same way that hanging around tall people will make you tall. 3) Legalizing gay marriage will open the door to all kinds of crazy behavior. People may even wish to marry their pets because a dog has legal standing and can sign a marriage contract. 4) Straight marriage has been around a long time and hasn't changed at all; women are still property, blacks still can't marry whites, and divorce is still illegal. 5) Straight marriage will be less meaningful if gay marriage were allowed; the sanctity of Brittany Spears' 55-hour just-for-fun marriage would be destroyed. 6) Straight marriages are valid because they produce children. Gay couples, infertile couples, and old people shouldn't be allowed to marry because our orphanages aren't full yet, and the world needs more children. 7) Obviously gay parents will raise gay children, since straight parents only raise straight children. 8) Gay marriage is not supported by religion. In a theocracy like ours, the values of one religion are imposed on the entire country. That's why we have only one religion in America. 8.5)The Bible says gay marriage is wrong, just like eating pork, shaving your head, and having a bowel movement without washing your body and clothes and consulting a priest is wrong. Of course, nobody does that. 9) Children can never succeed without a male and a female role model at home. That's why we as a society expressly forbid single parents to raise children. 10) Gay marriage will change the foundation of society; we could never adapt to new social norms. Just like we haven't adapted to cars, the service-sector economy, or longer life spans. I'm sure many of you have seen this, but I had to repost it.

and I don't mean from natural causes.  I mean I am going to fuckin KILL him. Since some of you are new to my friends list, and my life, basic rundown.  Our mom died 14 feb this year.  Ray, my brother and the only thing to've kept me alive for many many years, is 18.  He was living with his gf in the downtown part of glens falls.  He and his gf broke up and he was going to be moving to NC to take a job, with a friend. He disappeared off the face of the earth a few weeks ago.  Cell phone is not in svc.  Hasn't logged onto his myspace page in almost 2 weeks, and it was at least a week before that that he and I last spoke. I finally got desperate enough to start messaging people on his myspace friends list (parents keep this in mind for when your kids have a myspace!).  Girl got back to me a few mins ago. He's living in Fort Ann with 'a girl'  WTF? I'm gonna fuckin kill him.

I emailed my ethics prof 07.07.06 and 18.07.06 to request a fucking withdrawl so i can take a music elective in the fall.  no fucking reply.  So I CALLED him today (he provided his number before semester's end).  No return call.  I'm getting fuckin aggravated.  He doesn't get off his sodding arse I'm going to the dean.  Not like I don't have ENOUGH shit to deal with.

also courtesy of Lance Bass

<FONT size=4>*N sync and the Backstreet Boys are walking on the beach one day. They see a bottle on the ground, and they rub it. Christina pops out. She says "I'll grant each group one wish." So the Backstreet Boys think about it, and they say "We want a city built just for us, everything in it is for us. And we want a huge wall around it, so that no one can get in or out." Christina nods, and *POOF* they have their city. so *N sync think about their wish for a while, talk to each other, then turn to Christina. "Tell us about this wall..." "Well, it's 500 feet tall and 50 feet wide, and nothing can get in or out." *N sync look at each other, smile, and say "fill it with water."</FONT>

....courtesy of Lance himself NASA has decided to send a shuttle into space with two monkeys and Lance Bass. They trained them for months. Then when they thought they were ready, they placed all three in the shuttle and got ready to send them up into space.

As the moment came closer NASA's mission control center announced, "This is mission control to Monkey One. Initiate!"

At that, the first monkey started typing like mad and suddenly the shuttle's engines ignited and the shuttle took off.

Two hours later NASA's mission control center announced, "This is mission control to Monkey Two. Initiate!"

At that, the second monkey started typing like mad and suddenly the shuttle separated from the empty fuel tanks.

Another two hours later mission control announced, "This is mission control to Bass..."

At this Lance responded, "I know, I know. Feed the monkeys and don't touch anything." [was going to post the link to his blog with this, but just remembered his page is private.  anyone wants it, ask or go to my myspace top 24]

that in the 21st century there are still tv shows and movies that aren't closed captioned!  I am hearing impaired (different from deaf for all you PCers) and rely on closed captioning to fill in the words that are jumbled.

Was trying to watch 12 Angry Men that I DVRd off TCM and even though I've seen it before I STILL couldnt freaking follow it!  I finally gave up and will just get the damn DVD.

There's a lot of songs that make me think of mom. This is the one I listen to most: Never Gone

I really miss you, a song that I gotta say The things we did, the things we said Keep comin' back to me and make me smile again You showed me how to face the truth Everything that's good in me I owe to you

Though the distance that's between us Now may seem to be too far It will never separate us Deep inside, I know you are

Chorus: Never gone, never far In my heart is where you are Always close, everyday Every step along the way Even though for now we've got to say goodbye I know you will be forever in my life (yeah) Never gone

No, no, no, no

I walk along these empty streets There is not a second you're not here with me The love you gave, the grace you've shown Will always give me strength and be my cornerstone

(Somehow) somehow you found a way To see the best I have in me As long as time goes on I swear to you that you will be

Chorus: Never gone, never far In my heart is where you are Always close (always close), everyday (everyday yeah) Every step along the way Even though for now we've got to say goodbye I know you will be forever in my life (in my life, yeah)

Never gone (gone from me) If there's one thing I believe (I believe) I will see you somewhere down the road again (I will see you somewhere, somewhere, somewhere, somewhere)

(Never gone) Never gone, never far In my heart is where you are Always close (always close, always close), everyday (everyday, everyday) Every step along the way Even though for now we've got to say goodbye (yeah, yeah) I know you will be forever in my life

Never gone, never far In my heart is where you are (in my heart is where you are) Always close (always close), everyday (everyday) Every step along the way

That patient care and well-being come before the almighty fucking $$$ (OR: How the Mental Health System Made Me Nuts) I am on 3 psych meds and they are definitely NOT cutting it! My doctors' office won't do my prescribing, even though at one point they said they would. Now the PA is saying that he said they would pnly prescribe until I could find a psychiatric provider. Whatever. Catch-22. I have a therapist, one that I like AND trust (VERY important!!!) Most facilities that provide comprehensive psych care require that you see one of their therapists in order to see their psychiatrist (psydoc). I don't want to leave my therapist! Now there IS a psydoc at my therapist's office, but he is a fucking moron. You cannot cut, crush, break, chew, or otherwise mutilate an extended release medication. That's why the pharmacist puts the pretty little black-on-yellow labels that SAY: Swallow whole, do not crush, break, or chew. Well, someone forgot to inform god...i mean my psydoc. Then he pulled the "Im the dr, your the patient; I know meds, you dont" crap. In the words of (omg Im dating myself) Homie the clown, "Homie don't play dat." I cannot see a doctor who refuses to write TWO FUCKING PRESCRIPTIONS (for 300 mg and 150 mg) and instead tells me to cut some in half. You don't even get even dosing, because the cuts are rarely even, but you know what? If they weren't extended release, I'd have sucked it the fuck up. Oh, this is the same doc who looked at my meds regimen coming out of Four Winds (he doesnt even think I ought've GONE) and says (not ASKS--SAYS) I'm changing this back to this (what HE had originally had me on). No, you ASK me! (My reply was- "Um, no, you're NOT.") So, back to the current situation: I FINALLY get the director of MHU/BHU at GF Hospital to agree to give me a one-time consult for recommendations if my doc will prescribe. Problem with that? Doc doesn't want to prescribe. I can kind of understand- they ARE GP's not psydocs, but wtf if all i need is a prescription written. In the meantime, I've come so fucking close to winding back at Four Winds it's not even funny. NOW my doc will write, for a VERY short period of time, because "he doesn't want to see me back at hospital." WELL, DOC, YOU'RE DOING A DAMN FINE JOB OF PUTTING ME THERE!!!! Now, I MAY have found a psychiatric NP in Warrensberg. I have to call in the A.M. and am praying to every god and goddess that is and ever was that I can get in there. Because otherwise, I have only one small hope- changing dr's. And all the doctors blame the insurance companies. Now I am all for insurance reform, but i ain't buyin in this case. Because psychiatrists CAN see patients without requiring them to see THEIR therapist. But that is where $$$ comes in. I have Medicaid. HMO but mcaid nonetheless. They pay a whopping $17 for a one hour psydoc visit. If I didnt have mcaid, I guarantee I would NOT have this issue! And the best part--I asked if I could pay cash out of pocket when I get my loans in about 6 weeks. It's apparently illegal to allow mcaid patients to pay cash if it is a normally covered service. (in other words, cosmetic surgery for strictly cosmetic reasons-that insurance WON'T cover, the patient can pay. But something like therapy, which it DOES, the MEDICAID patient can't. WTF!) I am so sick of this system. And the great part is that I will be going thru this the rest of my life. Someone please pass me the gun now. (YES i am joking)
you'd think my father would know the difference between pads and tampons?!   Thank god for friends who will go back into a store they left to make said purchase because said man is ... dense.

I'm so freaking tired of feeling like this.  I just want to feel normal.  I'm not even sure i know what normal feels like.

I'd like to go a whole week without sleeping more than 14 or 15 hours at a time for at least three of those days.

I'd like to know what being truly happy feels like.

I'd like to get thru a week without once wishing I was dead.

I wish I could quit abusing myself.

I hate my life and (at the moment at least) I hate myself.  I'm going to bed soon.  It's only 3.40 pm and I just cant face the rest of this day.

7. Do you live by yourself? HA HA HA HA HA You're FUNNY!

9. What's the nearest food to you right now? A cup of Jell-O

11. Do you know what a plecostamous is? nope and I'm not going to look it up

who would it be? Doc Strous

28. Do you vote for city-related issues? If it's on the ballot when I vote, I vote for it

29. Do you say 'ya'll', 'you guys', 'dudes', or something else when
adressing more than one friend at a time? Yep

illegal? no.

they were waving at someone else? Oh yeah.

33. What did you do^^? Feel like a dumbass.

42. Do use mouthwash? no

etc)? Yeah, Smokey Mtn Nat'l Park

accept them back into your life? If it was strictly a lover, who the fuck cares.

60. Do you eat carbs? yes

61. If you could be one animal for the rest of your life, what would you
pick? cat

62. Are you the kinda person who will search the entire room for the
remote because you don't wanna change it on the TV? Yep only cos the power switch on my telly is broken and I can't turn it on or off w/o the remote

64. Have you ever gone to work/school drunk? does getting drunk at a student gov't retreat count?

65. Is it all about YOU? Yep, so deal with it.

Courtesy of The Friday Five here on LJ (sorry I don't do links well)  As per them, copy and paste it to ur LJ and leave a comment with your answers here.

1) When does liking someone a lot become loving that person?
When you realise that life without that person isn't worth living.

2) Is there a job you would do for free, and is it your current job?
Yes.  No.

3) What is one person/thing that inspired you to take action of some sort?
Politics.  Also seeing people being mistreated.

4) Though you might not believe in it, would you like fate to exist?
I belive in it.

5) What's the kindest thing that anyone has ever done for you?
Gave me money when my purse turned up missing, so that I could still buy a bus ticket.
My mom died today, 1915 (715 pm) after a long battle with cancer.  Now I have a new reason to hate valentine's day.

I am so friggin tired.  Physically and mentally.  My depression is horrid; I am going to ask my therapist about going back to four winds.  Trying to get ahold of Soc Sec rep hear for SSD, the phone is busy for the last 10+ mins.  

I slept 3 hours last nite, had to leave my house three hours befoe my appt cos of the GDCSMFin bus schedule!  So i sit here at ACC for 1.5 hrs before my appt, and will be back for 1.5 hrs AFTER it (thats more time than I spent on campus all last term I think!)

God just let me keep a minute shred of sanity.

Or as I say:

God:
Grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change,\
The Courage to change the things I can
and the wisdom to hide the bodies of all those people I had to kill because they pissed me off!

So my neighbours apparently decided that the best way to ring in the new year was a fight.  with a knife.  so I got to talk to the cops for half an hour this morning.  Christ all-fucking-mighty but people are fucked up

I was looking at pictures online, and just got this WICKED strong urge to call my ex-bf Marcel, totally out of NOWHERE.  

So I called him, and the first thing I said was, were you wanting me to call you?

He started laughing hysterically and said Yes

Just WEIRD

[Today mum was discharged from hospital.  This was a rough day because we had to go over and start going through her things that we wanted (we = me & my brother)] I am SOOOOOO ticked. My aunt chose THIS night, with my mum THERE to light into me about not doing my share. She says I give one excuse after another. The 'excuses' I offered the only three times I gave them: ~It was finals week at school and I was not doing well and needed to study (this was last xmas season) ~I had an emotional breakdown A BREAKDOWN MIND YOU and was in treatment 7 hrs/day, 5 days/week ~today, I have had back spasme to the point where I could hardly WALK the last two days! I can walk today but still get uncomfortable. Today she asked me to get some boxes from the car. She asked if I could do her a favour, I said not if it involves LIFTING anything. Thats all i said. She got all kinds of mad and got into my face and went off on me (quietly). Shes lucky I didnt push her. Thats my first reaction when some hostilely invades my personal space, it comes from surviving child abuse. OMG I AM SO MAD right now.

Me n Jess went to Dennys for dinner.  After dinner I had to potty.  No one was in there, so I used the handicapped stall (for those who dont know me, I dont fit well in a regular stall.)

This woman came in with another girl, the other one having a mental handicap (down's or something).

Long story short.  She started bitching that she bet that "that person in that stall isnt even handicapped"

I told Jess about it when I came out, and she said "Who the fuck is she to judge who's handicapped?!"

Then the woman came back in (she went to her car for a change of clothes for the girl) and started bitching about (I shit you not) People 'ILLEGALLY using handicapped bathroom stalls!'

Jess repeated what she said, TO the woman this time, And I told her to suck it the fuck up and daeal.  I was NOT in the mood to listen to that self righteous cunt

Um. . .? Yeah that's a real statement above.

President Bush  on Monday defended U.S. interrogation practices and called the treatment of terrorism suspects lawful. "We do not torture," Bush declared in response to reports of secret CIA  prisons overseas.

Bush supported an effort spearheaded by Vice President Dick Cheney  to block or modify a proposed Senate-passed ban on torture.

"We're working with Congress to make sure that as we go forward, we make it possible, more possible, to do our job," Bush said. "There's an enemy that lurks and plots and plans and wants to hurt America again. And so, you bet we will aggressively pursue them. But we will do so under the law."

Cheney is seeking to persuade Congress to exempt the CIA  from the proposed torture ban if one is passed by both chambers. Does this strike anyone else as WRONG?

Today another good woman, one loved by many, was taken away from people on earth who needed her, and from more still who adored her.

Maria Morgan, Asst registrar at my college, died today.  She was diagnosed 3 weeks ago with lung cancer that had metastasised to her bones and brain.  They were radiating her brain and if that took, they would give her chemo.  If all went well she'd have a couple years.

She always asked me how I was doing last term, when my depression was really bad.  I dont think she knew how much it meant to me.

I am absolutely heartbroken right now.  Im vaccillating between shock and sobbing.  Once again I am inj a position of questioning if there really is a benevolent and loving God.

WHY DO YOU DO THIS?  BENEVOLENT GOD MY ASS!  YOU KEEP TAKING AWAY GOOD PEOPLE -- PEOPLE WHO ARE TOO FUCKING YOUNG!  YOU LEAVE THE ROTTEN HORRID EVIL ONES HERE TO RUIN PEOPLES LIVES AND YOU TAKE THE GOOD ONES!

BECKY DIDNT DESERVE TO LOSE HER MUM LIKE THIS!  MARIA DIDNT DESERVE TO die LIKE THIS!

I HATE YOU I HATE YOU I HATE YOU I HATE YOU I HATE YOU

Dear Monica, Two weeks ago, we offered the Republicans in Congress an opportunity. The American people were watching, and we gave them a chance to show that middle-class families are more important than their twice indicted and three-times admonished Republican House Leader. Thank you for adding your voice to our call. At the beginning, only three out of more than 200 Republicans who accepted DeLay's influence peddling money took this opportunity to return the money and declare their independence. That number still stands at... three. So now more than ever, we have to keep up the pressure. More calls, more e-mails, more petition signatures. Let's reach a critical mass! Make them walk the line -- they can either choose to return the money and stand with the American people, or keep the money and stand with Tom DeLay -- the former Republican Leader who has been admonished three times by the Ethics Committee and indicted multiple times by a grand jury. Republicans got themselves into a bad spot through years of blind loyalty to DeLay and his culture of corruption. Time and time again, they've taken DeLay's dirty money thereby accepting the corrupting influence of the DeLay, Inc. money machine and marking themselves as DeLay dead-enders. But we are exposing them. Through the dozens of local and national press stories we generated, hard working families are beginning to know the truth. Now, we need to give them one final push before we deliver your names to their campaigns. If you haven't forwarded this to your friends and family, please ask them to join us now: Forward Our Call to Tell House Republicans to Return DeLay's Dirty Money. In the disgraceful energy bill vote two weeks ago, you could see the gears of Tom DeLay's machine in action, fueled by the millions of dollars he's pumped into the Republican Congress. Just days after Katrina struck, DeLay announced 1 he and "Smoky" Joe Barton would put together an energy package in the name of the disaster. Ears perked up from the oil industry lobbyists 2, and they came running to get a seat at the table with the two Republicans known as "The Toxic Texans." Surprise, surprise, out comes a bill that allows more pollution, gives more handouts to one of the most profitable industries in the world, and does nothing to lower the obscene gas prices that fuel those profits. No Republican in their right mind could think this was good policy. They all had seen a letter from a fellow Republican pointing out that "The new energy bill will do nothing for consumers and will hurt taxpayers, but it sure will help the bottom line of oil companies." 3 So why did 212 of them vote for it? Because that's just how things work when Tom DeLay is in charge. All he asked for from the Republicans he supported was that they vote as he told them to on the bills that showered giveaways on his donors. That's exactly what they've done for years, and even after he had been indicted, they did it again. If you have a friend or family member angry about gas prices, forward this on so they know what the Republican Congress in Washington is "doing about it" -- and how they can fight back: Forward Our Call to Tell House Republicans to Return DeLay's Dirty Money. We can't let up for a minute -- Republicans in Congress need to start working for the American people and not Tom DeLay. Sincerely, John Lapp Executive Director, DCCC 1 The Hill, October 8 http://www.hillnews.com/thehill/export/TheHill/News/Frontpage/090805/gop.html 2 The Hill, October 14 http://www.hillnews.com/thehill/export/TheHill/Business/091405.html 3 Mercury News, October 6 http://www.mercurynews.com/mld/mercurynews/news/politics/12837366.htm
